Column.Name: Parent Structure

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "RecordID", "Submission", "[Approver Decision] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT("In Progress") & " AND " & "[Approval GUID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Approval GUID]) & " AND " & "[UUID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Submission Event UUID]) & " AND " & "[RecordID] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Submission ID]), HASH("credentials", "550a1a0e-14f1-4407-80e7-237c89de275b") ) <> NULL()

SetReturnValue.Description: UUID is valid, return success page
UUID is not valid, return expired page

TriggerCustomEvent.EventArgumentsFormula: //HASH("UUID", HASH_GET([Params], "UUID"), "Type", HASH_GET([Params], "Type")) HASH( "UUID", [Submission Event UUID], "Type", [Event Type], "guid", [Approval GUID], "Comment", [Comment] )

SetReturnValue.Description: UUID is valid, return success page
UUID is not valid, return expired page
